body_html:
To use xla.compile with the model from issue #22216, I'd recommend using the estimator_model_fn decorator as seen here.

Note that this requires all variables to be resource variables.

Please let us know if you run into issues with this approach.
body_text:
To use xla.compile with the model from issue #22216, I'd recommend using the estimator_model_fn decorator as seen here.
Note that this requires all variables to be resource variables.
Please let us know if you run into issues with this approach.
body:
To use xla.compile with the model from issue #22216, I'd recommend using the estimator_model_fn decorator as seen [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/compiler/xla.py#L606).

Note that this requires all variables to be resource variables.

Please let us know if you run into issues with this approach.
